ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then their destination will be the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then to Hell they will surely be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then their return will be to the same blazing Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They can only return to hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then surely their return is towards hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then thereafter, verily, their return is to the flaming fire of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then most surely their return shall be to hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then their return is unto Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And afterward, lo! their return is surely unto hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then surely they shall return to Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thereafter verily their return is Unto the Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then their retreat will be toward hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then shall their return be to the (Blazing) Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then thereafter, verily, their return is to the flaming fire of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then their return is to Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then their return will be to the Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:68] Then indeed their return shall be to Hell-fire — this suggests that they exit from it [only] to drink the boiling water, which is located outside it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And afterward, lo! their return) their destination (is surely unto hell) the middle of hell.
